The Paragnostic Assembly has contacts in most major govern­ ments, churches, and guilds, and its various archives contain greatly from its connections and holdings. These advantages almost every piece of information imaginable. Members who come at a price, though: You are expected to contribute tim| have gained sufficient rank in the organization can benefit and money to furthering the Assembly's aims. At ranks 1 though 3, you must donate 5% of all treasure abandon a friend or a goal, but it's often wiser to retreat gained from adventuring to the Assembly and devote at least and come back after doing research than to be unprepared 1 month per year to quests it assigns to you. At ranks 4 and 5, for a fight. this amount increases to 10%, and you must quest for at least 2months per year. You also must donate 20% of any treasure Advancement gained on assigned quests to the organization. Furthermore, The Paragnostic Assembly is not a secretive group.
